generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA wearable air conditioner with ion purifier. QOOLA has both heating and cooling functions with a wide temperature range making it useful for all seasons. 

Tone: informative, important

Audience: drivers, service people
generations.text: QOOLA is the perfect way to stay comfortable no matter what the temperature is outside! With both heating and cooling functions, QOOLA can be used in all seasons. The wide temperature range and ion purifier make it perfect for drivers and service people who are constantly on the go.

Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA wearable air conditioner with ion purifier. QOOLA has both heating and cooling functions with a wide temperature range making it useful for all seasons. 

Tone: problem solving 

Audience: old people
generations.text: Looking for a wearable air conditioner that can help you stay cool all year round? Look no further than QOOLA! Our air conditioner has both heating and cooling functions with a wide temperature range, making it perfect for any season. Plus, our ion purifier helps to remove harmful particles from the air, keeping you healthy and comfortable. Give QOOLA a try today!

Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA wearable air conditioner with ion purifier. QOOLA has both heating and cooling functions with a wide temperature range making it useful for all seasons. 

Tone: problem solving 

Audience: old people
generations.text: Looking for a product to help you stay cool in the summer and warm in the winter? Look no further than QOOLA! Our wearable air conditioner with ion purifier can help you stay comfortable all year round. We have both heating and cooling functions with a wide temperature range, making it perfect for any season. Plus, our ion purifier helps to remove harmful particles from the air, making it healthier for you to breathe.

text: Summer is coming and the heat is unbearable! Don't suffer any longer, get a QOOLA wearable air conditioner! Worried you are going to buy something you can only use a fraction of the year, well QOOLA has got you covered. QOOLA comes with both heating and cooling functions along with an ion purifier, making it useful all year round. Whether it is the summer heat, the spring pollen, or the winter freezing cold, there is nothing that QOOLA can't beat.
